item.title: Dividing train/dev/test sets in machine learning
item.description: 1. Why Does It Matter? Or When Does It Matter? In one of my current projects, our team try to generate a machine learning model to predict whether some rare event would be happened or not. Since we don’t want to use any information from our test set, even in overall descriptive statistics, how to divide our whole dataset into train/dev/test sets becomes one of our concern before further analyses.
